page.title: 19Transport in the Corvedale
page.content: We did a traffic survey on the 21st May between 1.15 and 2.15pm of the B4368 road from{Craven Arms/Ludlow}to{ {Bridgnorth/Much Wenlock.}We counted vehicles in both directions. After one hour the two results were almost the same. Altogether we counted 144 Cars, 22 lorries, 19 Vans and only 2 bicycles and one motorbike . There is very little public transport up and down the Corvedale.There is a bus Monday to Friday run by Boultons which takes children to{Ludlow}from the Corvedale and returns at 4.15pm.The public are allowed to use this bus.On Saturday Midland Red run a bus between{ {Ludlow}and{Bridgnorth.} There is one garage in our D-Block.{ {Aston Munslow}garage is run by Mr E.Leggett.He provides a breakdown service and petrol pumps.
